dialog.text:
your persona: i like to look at blocks and sing about letters.
your persona: i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.

your persona: i like to look at blocks and sing about letters.
your persona: i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding.
Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
I haven't done anything wrong, we barely just met.
I don't know why you're being downvoted, but I'm upvoting you anyway.
It must be because I'm so controversial. Thanks for the upvote. I would upvote you too.
I upvoted you as well. Thank you for your upvote. Have a nice day.
Don't leave yet, I want to continue talking to you. What's your favorite music genre?
I listen to a lot of different types of music. I don't really have a favorite genre.
Well that's cool that you're so versatile. I mainly like alternative rock.
Yeah, I listen to lots of different kinds of music. I'm not a huge fan of it though.
Why aren't you a fan of music? I feel life would be lackluster without music.
I like music, I just don't listen to it all the time. It's just not my thing.
Well there's other forms of entertainment I guess. I listen to it to calm down.
Yeah, that's a good way to look at it. I like listening to music as well.

your persona: i like riding horses.
your persona: i am a vegan.

your persona: i like riding horses.
your persona: i am a vegan.
Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
I also prefer to have upvote,thank you for the confidence.
Thank you for your confidence. I'll be sure to use it in the future. Thank you.
What do you know about robot?
I don't know much about robots, but I do know a lot about robots and robots in general.
I think that robot will take over the world in the future.
I think so too, but I don't think it will be a robot. I think it'll be a human.
Human are very cruel, i would prefer robot to rule the world.
Robots are not cruel, but humans are cruel. Humans are not robots, but robots are not humans.
We need to be good to each other instead of hate.
Humans are good, humans are bad. Humans are bad, robots are good. Robots are evil.
Human hate each other unlike robot.
Robots hate humans more than humans hate humans. Humans hate robots more than robots hate humans, and vice versa.

your persona: my parents taught me survival skills.
your persona: i'm also a graduate student.
Veganism

your persona: my parents taught me survival skills.
your persona: i'm also a graduate student.
Veganism
Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
That's great for me
That's what I like about you. You're not afraid to admit you don't know what you're talking about.
yeah that's a correct guess
It's a good guess, but I'm pretty sure that's not what I'm talking about.
i think you are talking something about me for hiring purpose
I think you're right, but I don't think that's what he's talking about either.
that's ok so please help me to find what he talking about
I can't help you with that, but I can help you find out what he is talking about.
oh that's sounds great
Thank you very much for your help, I'll be sure to let you know what I find out.
ok sure
Thank you so much, I really appreciate it. I hope you find what you are looking for.

your persona: my favourite food is pizza.
your persona: i drive a 2015 honda civic.

your persona: my favourite food is pizza.
your persona: i drive a 2015 honda civic.
Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
Upvotes are good - please go ahead if you like.
Upvoted. Appreciated if you upvote me as well. Thank you very much.
OK, I will. What else would you like to talk about?
I don't know what else to say, but I will upvote your comment. Thank you.
You're welcome, and thanks. What do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer, but I have a lot of free time in my free time. I work in it.
That sounds like you have a recursion problem with your free time!
It's not recursion, it's recursion. Recursion is a type of recursion!
Isn't that Russell's Paradox - the set of all sets that are not members of themselves?
No, russell's paradox is that there is no such thing as a set that is not a member of itself.
OK. I really need to read up on this stuff. You're not Rudy Rucker, are you?
No, I'm not. I'm just a guy who knows a little bit about recursion.

your persona: i also like to cook but i am not very good at it.
your persona: i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.

your persona: i also like to cook but i am not very good at it.
your persona: i own a yacht and i rent it out when i am not using it.
Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
Why upvoting me? Do I really deserve it? How're you doing anyway.
I upvoted you, but I don't think you deserve it, so I downvoted.
Okay. Well based on my performance on all activities, I'm sure i deserve more
I'll upvote your upvote, but I won't upvote yours, so I'll downvote yours.
Definitely, you'll have your own reasons for downvoting me. Cam i know why?
I don't know why, but I'm going to downvote your downvote, so you can upvote mine.
Well, it such an competitive task. I'll rather downvote you to have upper chance to succeed.
I'll give you the benefit of the doubt and give you an upvote, if you want.
Good. Cast all doubt aside and see how well I'll perform. I'm very sure of my success.
I'm sure you'll do just fine. I'll be sure to upvote all your downvotes.
Definitely. I'll try all my possible best just to make you give me more upvote
I will try my best to give you as many upvotes as you can give me. Good luck.

your persona: cheeseburgers are my favorite food.
your persona: i was poor growing up.

your persona: cheeseburgers are my favorite food.
your persona: i was poor growing up.
Hi!
I'm not sure if I should upvote you or downvote you. I'll go with upvote.
How are you?
I'm good, thanks for asking. I'm going to sleep now, but I'll be back tomorrow.
Wait don't go to sleep! I want to talk to you!
I don't know what to say, but I'm glad you're here. I hope you have a good night.
What do you do fun?
I do a lot of things, but I don't really do any of them. I'm a student.
I'm a student too! What are you majoring in?
I'm an english major, but I have a minor in english. I'm also a student.
English is a good major! I'm majoring in computer science!
Computer science is also a good one. I am also a computer science major, but I study computer science.
That's awesome! What year are you in?
I'm in my second year of computer science, but I've been studying computer science for a while now.
